item.description:
We have a fresh Layer of over a foot of snow, there will be a chill in the air, so lets go out and watch the Myopia dog Sled Races in Ipswich.

The 2011 Myopia Sled dog Races will be staging in Ipswich MA at Appleton Farms. There will be a 4/6/8/11 mile trails running thru the woodlands at Appleton Farms to Hamilton MA.

We will meet at Pingree School, where there is free parking. If you park at the Start or Finish lines, there is a $20.00 parking fee. Once we all meet at Pingree, we will walk over to one of the many spectator areas and watch the Dog sleds.

This is a free event to the public with the exception of the parking fee at the Start/finish line.

The forecast for Saturday, is extremely cold, High around 28. So please dress accordingly and be prepared for the elements.

Once you get to the Pingree School parking lot, please call the Meetup Phone and we will let you know where we are located in the parking lot. The meetup phone number is : 978-304-2811.

Hope to see you at Pingree.

Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: Call the meetup phone upon arriving
item.name: Myopia Dog Sled Races
